examples: We distinguish several kinds of maple
The fleeing convicts were picked out of the darkness by the watchful prison guards
I can't make out the faces in this photograph

definitions.text: be a distinctive feature, attribute, or trait; sometimes in a very positive sense
examples: His modesty distinguishes him from his peers

definitions.text: identify as in botany or biology, for example
(used of persons) standing above others in character or attainment or reputation
used of a person's appearance or behavior; befitting an eminent person
